position: IITKGP | Analyst @JPMC | World Bank | HBG'21 | IISc. Bangalore | DS & ML

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Team: CCAR (Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review)•  Forecasted revenues for the annual CCAR cycle mandated by the Federal Reserve Bank.•  Analyzed historic revenue trends to build new models based on the latest data.•  Developed linear regression models for revenue forecasts under stress scenarios. •  Improved previous models with business-intuitive regression techniques.
experience.description_html: Team: CCAR (Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review)• Forecasted revenues for the annual CCAR cycle mandated by the Federal Reserve Bank.• Analyzed historic revenue trends to build new models based on the latest data.• Developed linear regression models for revenue forecasts under stress scenarios. • Improved previous models with business-intuitive regression techniques. <!---->

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: Team: DIME (Developmental Impact Evaluation)•  Analyzed Lok-Adalat data in India for the World Bank's DIME group. •  Conducted surveys on the experiences of disputants and counselors. •  Analyzed dispute resolution data with QGIS, STATA, and R.•  Created a Shiny-based web app to visualize data and compare state performance.•  Presented a report with state-wise recommendations for improving Lok-Adalats in India.
experience.description_html: Team: DIME (Developmental Impact Evaluation)• Analyzed Lok-Adalat data in India for the World Bank's DIME group. • Conducted surveys on the experiences of disputants and counselors. • Analyzed dispute resolution data with QGIS, STATA, and R.• Created a Shiny-based web app to visualize data and compare state performance.• Presented a report with state-wise recommendations for improving Lok-Adalats in India. <!---->
